titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to post on the official public Internet site of the House of Representatives all lobbying registrations and reports filed with the Clerk under the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary: 2/9/2005--Introduced. Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to: (1) post on the official public Internet site of the House each registration and report filed with and retained by the Clerk under the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 in a manner similar to that by which the Secretary of the Senate posts on the Senate's official Internet site he registrations and reports filed with and retained by the Secretary under such Act; and (2) provide notice of such posting on each registration and report form prepared and provided by the Clerk.
